raw akas.title: Small Business Revolution on Main Street

akas: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (original title)
Small Business Revolution on Main Street (working title)
akas from release info: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (original title)
Small Business Revolution on Main Street (working title)

1.title: Welcome to Bristol Borough

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Struggling river town, Bristol Borough, Penn., is rich in history and diversity, but has been desperate for a revival since losing its mills and thousands of jobs. Deluxe Corporation is investing $500,000 into Season 2's winning town and six of its small businesses. Will it be enough to spark a revolution?

2.title: Hems Truck and Auto

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Struggling river town, Bristol Borough, Penn., is rich in history and diversity, but desperate for a revival. Deluxe Corporation is investing $500,000 into Season 2's winning town and 6 of its small businesses. Will it be enough to spark a revolution?

3.title: Miguel's Riverside Barber Shop

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Owner Miguel has a steady stream of loyal clientele, but his income doesn't show it. He is ready to expand and become more profitable, but unexpected landlord problems threaten his business. Can we help him navigate these challenges and snip his way to solid revenue?

4.title: Annabella's Italian Restaurant

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Warm and inviting with authentic cuisine, Annabella's is a Bristol treasure, but struggles with seasonality. Owners Bob and Alison are eager to capitalize on newfound tourism. Can we help them cook up an image that matches their gourmet cuisine and lures diners in?

5.title: Polka Dot Parlor

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Owner Paulette is passionate about making women feel good, no matter their style, with her fun and quirky clothing boutique. Her endless energy and little retail expertise has led to a cluttered store and busy brand. Can we help this shop owner cut back the clutter and rack up the revenue?

6.title: Keystone Boxing & MMA Gym

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Owner Jose has a passion for coaching and a wealth of ideas, but is still finding his footing as a business owner. Without a clear business plan, he struggles to identify and focus on his best revenue streams. Can we help him create a knock out plan for success business takes a hit?

7.title: Discover, Learn and Grow

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Ramona and Marcelous are a mother-son duo with a passion for educating. But their preschool is new to town and is struggling to get to capacity. Can they get educated on how to build trust in the community and run a thriving business in order to pass the ultimate test?

8.title: Bristol Borough Finale

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: The Small Business Revolution helped spark a revolution for Bristol Borough, Pennsylvania. Can we provide them with the tools they need to keep the momentum going?

1.title: Meet Wabash

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Meet Wabash, Indiana, winner of the inaugural season of Small Business Revolution - Main Street. A typical Midwestern small town tucked in the rust belt of America struggling to reinvent itself since its manufacturing industry went away. Get to know the community and its leaders and learn how Deluxe plans to spark a revolution.

2.title: Harry's Old Kettle Pub and Grill

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Owners Harry and Judy dream of turning their bar into a restaurant where Harry can flex his culinary chops, but after years of ownership, it remains elusive. Can a little cash infusion and marketing help get this dream off the back burner?

3.title: Ellen's Bridal and Dress Boutique

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Even as a classy bridal shop that would fit in well on 5th Avenue, owner Lisa still struggles to compete from her small-town location. Will a top-notch branding boost and collaboration with other local businesses be enough to transform her shop into a regional bridal destination?

4.title: Filament Tattoo

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Meet Matt Haynes of Filament Tattoo, a pastor turned tattoo artist. Deluxe and Robert Herjavec devised ways help Matt market himself more effectively, so that he can take care of his employees and his seven kids.

5.title: Schlemmer Brothers

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Kent and Kris run this century-old business specializing in fireplaces. But it's struggling to survive with little retail or marketing expertise. Can a more effective website and a crash course on digital marketing ensure they're around another hundred years?

6.title: Thriftalicious

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Owners Tracy and Aaron have four kids and two hearts of gold, but no clear business strategy. While trying to cater to everyone, they ended up appealing to few. Can we sell them on the power of careful curation and great retail design before it's too late?

7.title: Eclectic Shoppe

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Owner Maria is passionate about showcasing local artists, but her altruism is blinding her business sense and she has a pricing strategy that threatens the life of the business. Can a refreshed and consistent brand support healthier pricing and save her business?

8.title: Wabash Finale

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Take a tour through Wabash to see the improvements we provided its Main Street and the marketing help we provided to draw more tourists to this hidden gem of Indiana.

9.title: Back to Wabash

episode of.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: One year after the Small Business Revolution left, we're back to check on the town and the six businesses. Will we find a town that kept the spark going or did the momentum fizzle out?

imdb.plot outline: Small towns across the country are fighting for their survival with the odds stacked against them. But what happens if we join that fight - if we dedicate a little money, a lot of experience and thousands of hours of work into one small town, focusing on the businesses at the heart of their Main Street? Each season, we let the public choose one lucky town to win a $500,000 revitalization and feature the transformation in an original series. Hosted by marketing expert Amanda Brinkman and celebrity entrepreneur Robert Herjavec, and accompanied by a host of small business experts and marketing gurus from Deluxe, the series showcases the life-changing transformations of the town and six of its small businesses in a truly remarkable series that educates and entertains.
imdb.title: Small Business Revolution: Main Street
plot: The Small Business Revolution on Main Street is seeking out America's most inspiring small towns, and each season, we're awarding a winner with a $500,000 revitalization and featuring the transformation in an eight-episode series.

Small towns across the country are fighting for their survival with the odds stacked against them. But what happens if we join that fight - if we dedicate a little money, a lot of experience and thousands of hours of work into one small town, focusing on the businesses at the heart of their Main Street? Each season, we let the public choose one lucky town to win a $500,000 revitalization and feature the transformation in an original series. Hosted by marketing expert Amanda Brinkman and celebrity entrepreneur Robert Herjavec, and accompanied by a host of small business experts and marketing gurus from Deluxe, the series showcases the life-changing transformations of the town and six of its small businesses in a truly remarkable series that educates and entertains.
